sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: By 101 votes to 7, UN member states have agreed to allow Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky to address next week's General Assembly by video, a sign of Russian isolation following the discovery of possible war crimes in Izyum.

sentences.sentence: Today the world must see what the Russian army left behind, said Zelensky in his evening address, another mass burial of murdered people.

sentences.sentence: While the causes of death are still being investigated, eyewitness reports say many of those buried had their hands tied and many others showed signs of torture.

sentences.sentence: Russian President Vladimir Putin has promised his Indian counterpart that he will do everything he can to end Moscow's assault on Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: His comments follow the two-day Shanghai cooperation organization so much with his eastern allies in Uzbekistan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After seven months of war, Putin is seeking new trade agreements following a raft of Western sanctions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: But the Russian premier finds himself in a difficult political situation as his partners expressed their concerns about the ongoing war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I know your position regarding the conflict in Ukraine and your concerns, said Putin, which you constantly raise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Pianello di Ostra in the Ancona region, residents clean up their homes and businesses after heavy rains on Thursday provoked flash floods that left ten dead and four missing. Three of those who died here became trapped after going into an underground car park to try to save their cars. Luckily we live on the first floor says this resident and from our terrace we saw this sudden mass of water that went up from 50 centimetres to 1.4 metres in less than 10 minutes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: When we arrived this morning it was really dramatic inside my grandmother's house.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's not inhabitable anymore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We threw everything inside away and I don't know if or when it will be possible to live here again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: These types of floods which are increasingly occurring across Europe have suddenly made climate change a campaign issue in the Italian election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Residents are talking about the need to rebuild a safe environment, said Prime Minister Mario Draghi. Without a safe environment, there's no way the people who live here can stay.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: So tackling the hydrogeological problem means tackling infrastructure problems, it means investing, but above all it means tackling climate change.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In Cantiano, the worst affected town, 420 millimeters of rain fell in just a few hours, the equivalent of the town's entire rainfall last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: As the British public continues to mourn the passing of Queen Elizabeth II. Her children, King Charles III, Princess Anne, Prince Edward, and Andrew, stood watch over

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: the former monarch's coffin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The tradition, known as the Vigil of the Princes, lasted for just 15 minutes, while the four siblings stood guard at the four corners of her coffin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There were just four of the estimated 400,000 people who are expected to pay their last respects to the Queen before she's buried on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In utter silence, a line containing some of those people say goodbye to the Queen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Some bow their heads, others salute her.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The line to say goodbye to the Queen is so long that authorities have said the wait could take between 14 to 24 hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Former soccer player David Beckham spent more than 14 hours queuing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Some people are even expected to wait through freezing nighttime temperatures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: While the state funeral is being carefully prepared, King Charles III visited the UK's capitals.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On Friday, he attended a mass for the Queen in Cardiff.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Metropolitan Police Force says two officers were hospitalised after being stabbed in central London.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The attack occurred around the Leicester Square area around 6am local time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A man in his 20s was arrested on suspicion of causing grievous bodily harm and assaulting an emergency worker.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Police do not believe the attack was motivated by terrorism or linked to the events relating to the death of the Queen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The San Sebastian International Film Festival is back and it kicks off this Friday. On par

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: with Cannes, Venice or Berlin, Spain's offering presents the very best of world cinema and in particular Hispanic film. Actress Juliette Binoche will receive the D'Anastia award, the festival's highest honor as tribute to her glittering career. The 70th edition of the festival will run until the 24th of September in the Basque country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Centre Pompidou in Paris is honoring the painter and sculptor Gerard Garouste.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Born in 1946, he drew inspiration from mythology, the Bible, literary greats and the origins of culture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Considered to be one of the most important French contemporary artists, his theatrical paintings are also housed in the Museum of Modern Art in New York. This exhibition gives space to the artist's installations, sculptures and graphic works.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: As one of the founders of the Italian Renaissance, Donatello was celebrated as a master of sculpture.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Unlike many artists of the day, he enjoyed fame and became financially successful during his lifetime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Florentine also pioneered a technique for sculpting marble panels called Schiacciato. Boasting almost 90 pieces and other major projects that have never been shown together, this is the most comprehensive collection of the artist's work to date and is on show at the Old Masters Picture Gallery in Berlin.
